adaptability.name: adaptability
adaptability.description: Powers up moves of the same type.

aerilate.name: aerilate
aerilate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.

aftermath.name: aftermath
aftermath.description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.

analytic.name: analytic
analytic.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.

anger_point.name: anger point
anger_point.description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

anger_shell.name: anger shell
anger_shell.description: Lowers Defense/Sp. Def and raises Attack/Sp. Atk/Speed when HP drops below half.

aroma_veil.name: aroma veil
aroma_veil.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

as_one.name: as one
as_one.description: Combines Unnerve and Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh.

aura_break.name: aura break
aura_break.description: Reduces power of Dark- and Fairy-type moves.

ball_fetch.name: ball fetch
ball_fetch.description: Retrieves a Poké Ball from a failed throw.

battery.name: battery
battery.description: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.

battle_armor.name: battle armor
battle_armor.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

battle_bond.name: battle bond
battle_bond.description: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.

beads_of_ruin.name: beads of ruin
beads_of_ruin.description: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

beast_boost.name: beast boost
beast_boost.description: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.

berserk.name: berserk
berserk.description: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.

big_pecks.name: big pecks
big_pecks.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

blaze.name: blaze
blaze.description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.

bulletproof.name: bulletproof
bulletproof.description: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.

cheek_pouch.name: cheek pouch
cheek_pouch.description: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.

chilling_neigh.name: chilling neigh
chilling_neigh.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

chlorophyll.name: chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

clear_body.name: clear body
clear_body.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

color_change.name: color change
color_change.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.

comatose.name: comatose
comatose.description: The Pokémon is always asleep but can still attack.

commander.name: commander
commander.description: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

competitive.name: competitive
competitive.description: Sharply raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

contrary.name: contrary
contrary.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

corrosion.name: corrosion
corrosion.description: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.

costar.name: costar
costar.description: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.

cud_chew.name: cud chew
cud_chew.description: Can eat the same Berry twice.

curious_medicine.name: curious medicine
curious_medicine.description: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.

cursed_body.name: cursed body
cursed_body.description: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.

cute_charm.name: cute charm
cute_charm.description: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.

damp.name: damp
damp.description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

dark_aura.name: dark aura
dark_aura.description: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

dazzling.name: dazzling
dazzling.description: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.

defeatist.name: defeatist
defeatist.description: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.

defiant.name: defiant
defiant.description: Sharply raises Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.

delta_stream.name: delta stream
delta_stream.description: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.

desolate_land.name: desolate land
desolate_land.description: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.

download.name: download
download.description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.

drizzle.name: drizzle
drizzle.description: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

drought.name: drought
drought.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.

dry_skin.name: dry skin
dry_skin.description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.

early_bird.name: early bird
early_bird.description: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.

earth_eater.name: earth eater
earth_eater.description: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.

effect_spore.name: effect spore
effect_spore.description: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.

electric_surge.name: electric surge
electric_surge.description: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.

electromorphosis.name: electromorphosis
electromorphosis.description: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move when hit by an attack.

embody_aspect.name: embody aspect
embody_aspect.description: Boosts Attack/Defense/Sp. Def/Speed depending on the form.

emergency_exit.name: emergency exit
emergency_exit.description: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.

fairy_aura.name: fairy aura
fairy_aura.description: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.

flame_body.name: flame body
flame_body.description: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.

flare_boost.name: flare boost
flare_boost.description: Powers up special attacks when burned.

flash_fire.name: flash fire
flash_fire.description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.

flower_gift.name: flower gift
flower_gift.description: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.

flower_veil.name: flower veil
flower_veil.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.

fluffy.name: fluffy
fluffy.description: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.

forewarn.name: forewarn
forewarn.description: Determines what moves a foe has.

frisk.name: frisk
frisk.description: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.

full_metal_body.name: full metal body
full_metal_body.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.

galvanize.name: galvanize
galvanize.description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.

gluttony.name: gluttony
gluttony.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

gooey.name: gooey
gooey.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

gorilla_tactics.name: gorilla tactics
gorilla_tactics.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

grass_pelt.name: grass pelt
grass_pelt.description: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.

grassy_surge.name: grassy surge
grassy_surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.

grim_neigh.name: grim neigh
grim_neigh.description: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

guard_dog.name: guard dog
guard_dog.description: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.

gulp_missile.name: gulp missile
gulp_missile.description: Returns with a catch in its mouth after using Surf or Dive.

guts.name: guts
guts.description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.

hadron_engine.name: hadron engine
hadron_engine.description: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.

harvest.name: harvest
harvest.description: May create another Berry after one is used.

healer.name: healer
healer.description: May heal an ally's status conditions.

heatproof.name: heatproof
heatproof.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

honey_gather.name: honey gather
honey_gather.description: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.

hospitality.name: hospitality
hospitality.description: Partially restores an ally's HP when it enters a battle.

hustle.name: hustle
hustle.description: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.

hydration.name: hydration
hydration.description: Heals status problems if it is raining.

hyper_cutter.name: hyper cutter
hyper_cutter.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.

ice_body.name: ice body
ice_body.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

ice_face.name: ice face
ice_face.description: Avoids damage from Physical moves for one turn.

illuminate.name: illuminate
illuminate.description: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.

illusion.name: illusion
illusion.description: Enters battle disguised as the last Pokémon in the party.

immunity.name: immunity
immunity.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.

imposter.name: imposter
imposter.description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

infiltrator.name: infiltrator
infiltrator.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

inner_focus.name: inner focus
inner_focus.description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.

insomnia.name: insomnia
insomnia.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

iron_barbs.name: iron barbs
iron_barbs.description: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.

iron_fist.name: iron fist
iron_fist.description: Boosts the power of punching moves.

justified.name: justified
justified.description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

keen_eye.name: keen eye
keen_eye.description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.

klutz.name: klutz
klutz.description: The Pokémon can't use any held items.

leaf_guard.name: leaf guard
leaf_guard.description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

levitate.name: levitate
levitate.description: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.

libero.name: libero
libero.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

lightning_rod.name: lightning rod
lightning_rod.description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.

limber.name: limber
limber.description: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

lingering_aroma.name: lingering aroma
lingering_aroma.description: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

liquid_ooze.name: liquid ooze
liquid_ooze.description: Damages attackers using any draining move.

liquid_voice.name: liquid voice
liquid_voice.description: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

long_reach.name: long reach
long_reach.description: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.

magic_guard.name: magic guard
magic_guard.description: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.

magician.name: magician
magician.description: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.

magma_armor.name: magma armor
magma_armor.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.

marvel_scale.name: marvel scale
marvel_scale.description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.

mega_launcher.name: mega launcher
mega_launcher.description: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.

merciless.name: merciless
merciless.description: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.

mimicry.name: mimicry
mimicry.description: Changes type depending on the terrain.

minds_eye.name: minds eye
minds_eye.description: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks to hit Ghosts.

minus.name: minus
minus.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

misty_surge.name: misty surge
misty_surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.

mold_breaker.name: mold breaker
mold_breaker.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

moody.name: moody
moody.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.

motor_drive.name: motor drive
motor_drive.description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.

moxie.name: moxie
moxie.description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

multiscale.name: multiscale
multiscale.description: Reduces damage when HP is full.

multitype.name: multitype
multitype.description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

mummy.name: mummy
mummy.description: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.

mycelium_might.name: mycelium might
mycelium_might.description: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.

natural_cure.name: natural cure
natural_cure.description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

neuroforce.name: neuroforce
neuroforce.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.

neutralizing_gas.description: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

no_guard.name: no guard
no_guard.description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

normalize.name: normalize
normalize.description: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.

opportunist.name: opportunist
opportunist.description: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.

orichalcum_pulse.name: orichalcum pulse
orichalcum_pulse.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.

overcoat.name: overcoat
overcoat.description: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.

overgrow.name: overgrow
overgrow.description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.

own_tempo.name: own tempo
own_tempo.description: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.

parental_bond.name: parental bond
parental_bond.description: Allows the Pokémon to attack twice.

pastel_veil.name: pastel veil

pickpocket.name: pickpocket

pickup.name: pickup
pickup.description: The Pokémon may pick up items.

pixilate.name: pixilate
pixilate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.

plus.name: plus
plus.description: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

poison_heal.name: poison heal

poison_point.description: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.

power_construct.name: power construct

power_of_alchemy.name: power of alchemy

power_spot.name: power spot
power_spot.description: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.

prankster.name: prankster
prankster.description: Gives priority to a status move.

pressure.name: pressure
pressure.description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

primordial_sea.name: primordial sea
primordial_sea.description: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.

propeller_tail.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

protean.name: protean
protean.description: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.

proto_synthesis.description: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

psychic_surge.name: psychic surge
psychic_surge.description: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.

quick_draw.name: quick draw
quick_draw.description: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

quick_feet.name: quick feet

rain_dish.name: rain dish
rain_dish.description: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.

receiver.name: receiver

refrigerate.description: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.

rks_system.description: Changes type depending on held item.

rock_head.name: rock head
rock_head.description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

rough_skin.name: rough skin
rough_skin.description: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.

run_away.name: run away

sand_rush.name: sand rush

sand_veil.name: sand veil

sap_sipper.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

scrappy.description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.

shed_skin.name: shed skin

sheer_force.name: sheer force
sheer_force.description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.

shell_armor.name: shell armor
shell_armor.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

soul-heart.name: soul-heart
soul-heart.description: Raises Special Attack when another Pokémon faints.

stalwart.description: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.

tangling_hair.description: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

teravolt.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

turboblaze.description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

unaware.description: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.

unburden.description: Raises Speed if a held item is used.

vital_spirit.description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

volt_absorb.description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
